en.title: FusionExcel Featured on Popular Filipino TV Channel IBC-13!
en.content:
REPORT FROM PHILIPPINE COUNTRY LICENSEE JEREMY LOOI.

Reynante "Rey" Langit is a multi-awarded Radio and TV journalist and newspaper columnist. He is regularly seen on the popular TV Channel IBC-13 and heard on radio station DWIZ. Together with his son JR and TV crew, Rey visited FusionExcel's Country Licensee office and shot some clips to feature FusionExcel on his weekly TV program. He got more than just a feature story. He praised FusionExcel and the health benefits our products gave!
Jeremy explains to Rey Langit the features of FE's Quantum Flask
and the Quantum Watch, with Allan Caidic helping out.
Allan Caidic explains to JR the product and the number of people who
uses and endorses FusionExcel's range of scalar energy products.
Samboy Lim narrates to JR how FusionExcel has helped a lot of people around
the world improve their health and at the same time create income.
JR interviews Jeremy Looi about FusionExcel. Jeremy explains the global
business opportunity as Quantum Science Products are now sold in
130 countries with 30 Country Licensees and growing by the week.
 
Samboy Lim being lifted by Rey Langit and JR with two other volunteers.
The smiles on their faces reflects the strain-free lifting of Samboy which
was made possible by the scalar energy products of FusionExcel.
Together with our distributors and endorsers, Rey Langit and son JR
gave the thumbs up approval for FusionExcel! Mabuhay!
